In multiplying two positive integers $a$ and $b$, Ron reversed the digits of the two-digit number $a$. His errorneous product was $161$. What is the correct value of the product of $a$ and $b$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  116 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 161  \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 204  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 214  \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  224 $
